scripts.package-win32: npx nwbuild . --mode build --platform win --arch ia32 --outDir build/win32
scripts.package-win64: npx nwbuild . --mode build --platform win --arch x64 --outDir build/win64
scripts.package-win: npm run package-win32 && npm run package-win64
